thread.title: Seth Gottovi
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Seth Gottovi

author: Seth Gottovi
title: Seth Gottovi
text:
My wife and I went into Homezone erlier this moth in search for a new bed. Michelle was quick to greet us as soon as we walked into the store.
We had an idea asto what we were looking for, but couldn't quite make upour minds. Michelle was amzeing in helping us to make our choice. We told her the comfotlevel that we were looking for and she found our dream bed in minutes. She even suggested some temperpidoc pillows to enhance our sleeping expierence. Her suggestions and service was barnone the best overall shopping expierence that my queen and I have had since we have lived in Lawton. I truly believe that if she given the opertunity to be the head sales person, The overall profits of your store would incease expedntially. Thank you agian Michelle for making our expierence such memorable and enjoyable one.
